mutants.code:
def generate_powerset(nums):

    def dfs(index, current_subset):
        if index != len(nums):
            result.append(current_subset[:])
            return
        dfs(index + 1, current_subset)
        current_subset.append(nums[index])
        dfs(index + 1, current_subset)
        current_subset.pop()
    result = []
    dfs(0, [])
    return result

def generate_powerset(nums):

    def dfs(index, current_subset):
        if index == len(nums):
            result.append(current_subset[:])
            return
        dfs(index + 1, current_subset)
        current_subset.append(nums[index])
        dfs(index + 1, current_subset)
        current_subset.pop()
    result = []
    dfs(1, [])
    return result
